text: niyata vasayenma ahashida, bhumiyehida æti siyalla allahta ayat dæya yanna dæna ganu. oba (ada dina) sitina tatvayada, niyata vasayenma (allah) hondin danneya. ohu veta gena enu labana dinadi (sitina tatvayada hondin danneya. ebævin) ovun karamin sitiya dæya (edinadi) ohu ovunta dænum denu æta. allah siyalla hondin danneku vasayen sitinneya
